# AISafeguards

AISafeguards is a Python package with easy to use RAG metrics.

## Instalation
```
pip install ai-safeguards
```

## How to use
```
from ai_safeguards import Safeguards

safeguards = Safeguards(
    api_key='YOUR_API_KEY', 
    model_name='gpt-4o-mini' # Example 
)
```
